modules.description: This module implements SSL/TLS client functionality for asynchronous network communication. It provides operations to create and manage secure client connections, including initializing SSL contexts, upgrading plaintext sockets to encrypted ones, and shutting down connections gracefully. The module works with SSL sockets and integrates with Async for handling non-blocking I/O operations.

This module implements TLS client operations for secure network communication. It provides functions to create and manage TLS connections, including upgrading existing sockets, shutting down connections, and checking connection status. Concrete use cases include establishing encrypted client connections to servers and handling ALPN protocol negotiation during TLS handshake.

Handles SSL/TLS connections for asynchronous servers, providing functions to create secure connection handlers and configure SSL sockets with specific protocols and certificates. Works with SSL sockets, runtime protocols, and request handlers, supporting operations like ALPN protocol negotiation and certificate-based authentication. Useful for implementing HTTPS servers with custom SSL configurations and handling encrypted client requests.

Implements asynchronous connection handlers for network servers, managing socket I/O and protocol initialization. Works with sockets, runtime protocols, and request handlers to process incoming connections and upgrade them to specific communication protocols. Useful for building high-performance network servers that handle encrypted or unencrypted HTTP/2 and HTTP/1.1 connections.

This module implements asynchronous client functionality for secure network communication using SSL/TLS protocols. It provides functions to create and manage secure client connections, including socket creation, protocol upgrade, graceful shutdown, and connection status checks. The module works with SSL and TLS sockets, supporting concrete use cases such as establishing encrypted connections to servers and handling secure protocol negotiation during handshakes.

Implements asynchronous network communication for servers and clients with support for secure protocols like SSL/TLS. Works with sockets and protocol handlers to manage connection setup, data transfer, and secure negotiation. Enables building high-performance HTTP servers and secure clients that establish encrypted connections and handle protocol upgrades during handshakes.
